title: Formula for Gravitational Force
text: The acceleration due to gravity g at the surface of the Earth is given by the equation:g $$=$$ \frac{G \cdot M}{r**2}.

title: Rearrange the Equation to Solve for Earth's Mass
text: What is M $$=$$ \frac{g \cdot r**2}{G}= \frac{9.807\text{m/s}**2 \cdot $$(6.3568$$ \times 10**6\text{m})**2}{6.674 \times 10**{-11}\text{Nm}**2/\text{kg}**2} in units of $${10}^{20}$$ kg?
